function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Virus transmission via surfaces and air circulation within the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and infection among occupants","Mitigation":"Implementation of advanced air filtration systems, regular disinfection of surfaces, and improvement of ventilation systems","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, UV-C light disinfection systems, and smart ventilation solutions","People":"Occupants and building staff","Owner":"Building facility managers and designers"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for social and physical interactions among occupants and the built environment","Impact":"Inefficient design leading to increased risk of close contact and disease transmission","Mitigation":"Integration of design elements that encourage safe interactions, such as open spaces and efficient ventilation","Technologies":"Smart sensors for monitoring occupancy and airflow, biophilic design principles, and modular room configurations","People":"Occupants, designers, and building facility managers","Owner":"Architects and building facility managers"},{"Description":"Existing systems that only follow simple measures such as physical distancing","Impact":"Inadequate protection against virus spread and transmission","Mitigation":"Integration of more comprehensive health and safety measures, such as advanced air quality monitoring and contactless technologies","Technologies":"Advanced air quality sensors, contactless systems for doors and fixtures, and real-time occupancy monitoring systems","People":"Occupants, building staff, and visitors","Owner":"Building facility managers"}]}
